choices: Iggy Koopa or Spike Koopa (Note they are good guys in this cannon)
One of the Denizens of Dinosaurland
1.content: From whose point of view will the story be told?
1.title: Point of View?

info.brief_description: A Super Mario story where almost anything goes. READ FULL DESCRIPTION PLEASE.
info.description:
This is a Super Mario Story where anything goes. Note: THIS IS BASED ON THE MOVIE NOT THE GAME! IF YOU HAVE NOT SEEN THE MOVIE DO NOT POST/DO NOT BITCH ABOUT THE DIFFERENCES BETWEEN THE TWO.
Just to explain a bit for you who have not seen but want to post.
1) Mario and Luigi are a pair of plumbers from the Bronx.
2) Princess Daisy (as well as all the denizens of the Mushroom kingdom) are humans that have descended from the dinosaurs and other reptiles.
3) Goombas and Koopa-troopers are victims of a De-evolution process by the Evil King Koopa (who was turned to primordial sludge by Mario and Luigi at the end of the movie but hey...law of the sequels.)
4) It is Dinosaurland not the Mushroom kingdom.
5) There is the city, and a desert. That's it.
6) Princess Peach was not revealed in the movie; Mario also already had a girlfriend, a tanning salonist named Daniella.
7) Yoshi is not big enough to ride, he is about the size of a medium dog.
8) Yoshi is a "throwback" meaning he is a naturally occurring de-evolved being (like if a woman gave birth to a monkey). He has a certain degree of intelligence but is mainly bestial in nature (he is the Royal pet.)
9) The high jumps are due to some kind of rocket boots.
10) the mushrooms were never actually eaten (They were Daisy's father de-evolved.)

If you break these rules you will suffer.
